Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a clutch three-run homer to give the Mets a 3-2 lead in the top of the ninth inning.
Starling Marte hit a single, scoring Jesse Winker for the insurance run.
Post-Match Reflections: Brandon Nimmo found out that his grandmother, Claudine Nimmo, passed away shortly before the game.
Francisco Lindor lets out a celebratory yell after the Mets' 4-2 NL Wild Card-clinching win over the Brewers.
Steve Cohen was in 'total disbelief' watching Alonso homer.
Mets President of Baseball Operations David Stearns said 'we just saw one of the greatest games in Mets history' after their 4-2 Game 3 win against the Brewers.
Francisco Lindor had to cut his postgame interview short as he rushed over to take a team picture.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Champagne is flying all over the place in the visitor's locker room at American Family Field as the Mets soak in their well-deserved wild-card series win against the Brewers.
